achievements.title: Cassette tape
achievements.desc: The first time you watched these, you didn't even know what they were.

achievements.title: Solid color
achievements.desc: Bomber jackets, high-waisted jeans, an overload of patterns, and bishies everywhere.

achievements.title: It's raining... tragic backstories!

achievements.title: Blockbuster
achievements.desc: Man, do you feel old as all hell.
